misc: Adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season
biography: Simo, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his fiery spirit and the occasional colorful language on the course. Representing Hirsala Golf, Simo has made nine appearances at the Hector Trophée, and is gearing up for his tenth in 2025.

A fierce competitor, Simo has secured three Hector Trophée victories, showcasing his skill in pair play. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his sights are set on future individual success.

Always looking for an edge, Simo has adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season, hoping it will bring him closer to both the team and individual titles. Keep an eye on Simo as he brings his passion and determination to the greens once again.
